SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.SceneController

Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.SceneController.GuiController
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoardController, ChatController, EnterGameSceneController, LobbyController, LoginSceneController, ObjectiveCardController, OtherShelvesController, PlayerNumSceneController, WaitingRoomController, WinSceneController
public abstract class GuiController extends Object
The GuiController class is an abstract class that serves as the base class for all GUI scene controllers. It defines methods for updating different aspects of the GUI based on the virtual model updates.
